attributes.action: to battle the price rise on airlines services inc paying for luggage,seats,ect
attributes.background: every day theres new prices going up by the airlines who dont even lower the airline tickets and they just suck out money every day for more bizzare purposes .

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
